nodes.text: Vurrha Chur was a male Quarren and the leader of a criminal group known as Vurrha's Blood.

Born on Mon Calamari to lower class parents, Vurrah Chur eventually found his way to the desert planet of Tatooine. Over the years, he worked as muscle for local law enforcement agencies on the planet before gradually accumulating a strong force of his own, becoming a small crime lord in Mos Eisley.

Vurrha was a strong individual, working his way up the ranks on the tough planet of Tatooine. As he accumulated greater power in the Mos Eisley underworld, he developed a set of ambitions for himself and his crime syndicate, including wealth, power, and becoming well-aged.
